item.title: S.1842 - Protecting Personal Health Data Act
item.description: Published: June 2019 URL: https://www.congress.gov/bill/116th-congress/senate-bill/1842/text Abstract: To protect the personal health data of all Americans.

item.title: S.2889 - National Security and Personal Data Protection Act of 2019
item.description: Published: November 2019 Abstract: To safeguard data of Americans from foreign governments that pose risks to national security by imposing data security requirements and strengthening review of foreign investments, and for other purposes.
